name: Tap Ninja - Avoid The Saw
description:
Little ninja is up for a dangerous challenge.Collect as many shurikens as you can.
Jump from one platform to other and collect all the shurikens but be careful of deadly saws in your way.

Features:
-Apple watch Game
-Vivid graphics
-Simple Controls
-Leaderboards
-Achievements to unlock
-Multiple characters to unlock
-Easy to play but hard to master

Free Download Now
